name: AgileMD
headline: Predictive analytics and clinical pathways for hospitals
description: At AgileMD, we are building the most advanced real-time predictive analytics and clinical algorithms platform for hospitals. Our cloud-based engine helps thousands of doctors and nurses around the country make medical decisions, so that every patient receives the highest quality and value of care based on the latest medical knowledge and data.

founders.name: Borna Safabakhsh, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
Borna is the co-founder and CEO of AgileMD, a digital health startup reinventing how clinical predictive analytics and decision support help physicians at the bedside.  Borna has an MBA from Chicago Booth, where he was recognized as Most Promising Entrepreneur by the University of Chicago and 50 for the Future by the Illinois Technology Foundation.

AgileMD’s clinical tools are used at over 81 hospitals and individually in use by over 65,000 healthcare providers to deliver high-quality care.

# Better Outcomes. Lower Clinical Burden.
Stop working for your EHR. Make it work for you.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/66799c4f08ac32dc4a171d86_img_eCART_TM_header.png)
###### Predict & Prioritize
#### **Clinical Deterioration Early Warning & Workflow**
Guide care teams to the highest-risk patients using industry-leading, FDA-cleared AI combined with actionable, embedded decision support for all-cause clinical deterioration.
[Learn more](https://agilemd.com/<#Solution-eCART>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/6618c01c8c2e87b5949f8398_img_pathways_2x.png)
###### Standardize & Improve
#### **Highly-Integrated & Adaptable Guidance**
Give care teams immediate access to the most updated protocols, streamlining order entry and documentation directly in their workflows.
[Learn more](https://agilemd.com/<#Solution-Pathways>)

### Approach
We support over-burdened clinical teams by addressing the fundamental frustrations of delivering care. In doing so, our platform ensures consistent, high-quality outcomes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/6605ed1da46ae9a4359beff5_img_peer_reviewed.png)
##### **Peer-Reviewed & Validated**
Rely on tested tools and proven results with 80 medical journal publications.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/62d742c41f3f8dfded13c19e_interface-icon-right.svg)eCART Publications](https://agilemd.com/</publications-ecart>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/62d742c41f3f8dfded13c19e_interface-icon-right.svg)Pathways Publications](https://agilemd.com/</publications-clinical-pathways>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/6605eee18a6bc93e4c8afe9b_img_implementation_feat.png)
##### **Rapid, Seamless Implementation**
Deploy at scale in days to weeks, not months to years, to make an impact sooner.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/62d742c41f3f8dfded13c19e_interface-icon-right.svg)Get in touch](https://agilemd.com/</contact-us>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/6605ef115a301473758f4ab3_img_metrics_3.png)
##### **Reporting & Benchmarking**
Understand and drive practice patterns at the health system, facility, unit, and provider level.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/62d742c41f3f8dfded13c19e_interface-icon-right.svg)Get in touch](https://agilemd.com/</contact-us>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/62d742c41f3f8d1dd113c1ac_icons8-avocado.svg)
##### **Seamless EHR Integration**
Embed clinical decision support into your existing workflow
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/62d742c41f3f8dfded13c19e_interface-icon-right.svg)Start Tour](https://agilemd.com/</template/old-home>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/62d742c41f3f8d0cec13c1ae_icons8-calculator-checked.svg)
##### **Rapid Implementation at Scale**
Deploy in days to weeks, not months to years
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/62d742c41f3f8dfded13c19e_interface-icon-right.svg)Get in touch](https://agilemd.com/</about/contact>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/62d742c41f3f8d703913c1d6_icons8-towels.svg)
##### **Reporting & Benchmarking**
Understand and drive practice patterns
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/62d742c41f3f8dfded13c19e_interface-icon-right.svg)Style Guide](https://agilemd.com/</template/style-guide>)
###### Predict & Prioritize
### eCART™
##### FDA Cleared Clinical Deterioration Early Warning & Workflow
For every hour of delayed ICU transfer, the odds of hospital mortality increase 3%. When high-risk patients are transferred in a timely manner, their associated length of stay decreases by 2 days.
Our partner health systems use eCART™ to improve these preventable outcomes, empowering their nurses and providers with better information on patient status, more support with an acuity-based workflow, and far fewer false alarms. Developed out of more than a decade of research and clinical implementation, our best-in-class analytic was trained and tested on nearly 3 million patient encounters from 28 hospitals across 6 health systems. It was retrospectively and prospectively validated on sepsis, COPD, CHF, and COVID populations.
[Request Demo](https://agilemd.com/</contact-us>)[Publications ](https://agilemd.com/</publications-ecart>)[|](https://agilemd.com/<https:/preview.webflow.com/preview/canopy-multilayout-template?utm_medium=preview_link&utm_source=designer&utm_content=canopy-multilayout-template&preview=d113823d2c4aa99bed09934163446531&pageId=62326633f08f348ddda67c82&workflow=preview>)[ News](https://agilemd.com/</news>)

##### eCART Benefits
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/6615c0edcbd39e7401501a3d_img_med_stamp_5.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/661599f982fb38e143703186_timer.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/6615995a9732f98286288284_chart-line-down.png)
**Decreased mortality, length of stay and direct variable costs**
###### Nurse Manager
"I love the simplicity of the scoring. Love that the color is in their face when the patient rises to that level, but otherwise out of the way. So much less alarm fatigue."
###### Novice Nurse
"I know exactly when and how to escalate my concerns and worry because it's right at my fingertips inside eCART." 
###### Standardize & Improve
### Clinical Pathways
##### Highly-Integrated & Adaptable Guidance
When clinical staff struggle to adopt the most updated medical evidence and facility protocols, patient care suffers and clinical resources get strained.
Our community of leading health systems use pathways to reduce clinical variation. Pathways integrate seamlessly with native EHR workflows and are deployed quickly without having to rely heavily on IT support. Teams easily convert existing guidance or leverage AgileMD’s substantial library of shared content to develop workflows customized for local needs and goals. More than 3,350 AgileMD pathways are live at partner institutions and cover adult, pediatric, and neonate topics in ambulatory, emergency, inpatient, ICU, and women's health settings. Our partners have published over 20 journal articles on their operational and outcome achievements with AgileMD Pathways.
[Request Demo](https://agilemd.com/</contact-us>)[Publications ](https://agilemd.com/</publications-clinical-pathways>)[|](https://agilemd.com/<https:/preview.webflow.com/preview/canopy-multilayout-template?utm_medium=preview_link&utm_source=designer&utm_content=canopy-multilayout-template&preview=d113823d2c4aa99bed09934163446531&pageId=62326633f08f348ddda67c82&workflow=preview>)[ News](https://agilemd.com/</news>)

Link to Training and References
##### Clinical Pathways Benefits
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/6615c0ecb737e693c615f258_img_med_stamp_4.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/66159bdec360beb790414b30_rocket.png)
**Rapid deployment and clinical consensus**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/66159bdeab950b7d31e3485d_stethoscope.png)
**Timely and appropriate diagnostics, medication and discharge**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/66159bdecee93d965f9044bd_hourglass-half.png)
**Reduced throughput, length of stay and readmissions**
###### Chief Quality Officer, 1800+ Bed Health System
“We had developed a ton of clinical variation reduction pathways over the course of time but it was very difficult to get those into workflows. We felt they were collecting dust and not being utilized to the maximum capacity. [Pathways] really allowed us to get our evidence-based practice into practice faster and more reliably.”
###### Chief Quality Officer, 2,300+ Bed Health System
"We have driven adherence rates to guideline best practices through the roof with this pathway.”
### Secure, pragmatic, built to the toughest CIO standards
The AgileMD Cloud CDS engine is SOC-II and HIPAA compliant with industry security architecture. ‍
Our hosted platform requires no on-site hardware and operates behind multiple layers of protection, encryption and network security, with advanced audit logging and monitoring services. Our technical team has worked with many premier IT quality control processes and is ready to collaborate with your IT team to configure the right security framework.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/660ee3a478ef7e2411289b13_SOC2_Logo_Revised_1_.591b2acad61e2.png)

### Approach
We support over-burdened clinical teams by addressing the fundamental frustrations of delivering care. In doing so, our platform ensures consistent, high-quality outcomes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/6605ed1da46ae9a4359beff5_img_peer_reviewed.png)
##### **Peer-Reviewed & Validated**
Rely on tested tools and proven results with 80 medical journal publications.
![⟨19⟩eCART Publications](https://agilemd.com/</publications-ecart>)
![⟨19⟩Pathways Publications](https://agilemd.com/</publications-clinical-pathways>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/6605eee18a6bc93e4c8afe9b_img_implementation_feat.png)
##### **Rapid, Seamless Implementation**
Deploy at scale in days to weeks, not months to years, to make an impact sooner.
![⟨19⟩Get in touch](https://agilemd.com/</contact-us>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/6605ef115a301473758f4ab3_img_metrics_3.png)
##### **Reporting & Benchmarking**
Understand and drive practice patterns at the health system, facility, unit, and provider level.
![⟨19⟩Get in touch](https://agilemd.com/</contact-us>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/62d742c41f3f8d1dd113c1ac_icons8-avocado.svg)
##### **Seamless EHR Integration**
Embed clinical decision support into your existing workflow
![⟨19⟩Start Tour](https://agilemd.com/</template/old-home>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/62d742c41f3f8d0cec13c1ae_icons8-calculator-checked.svg)
##### **Rapid Implementation at Scale**
Deploy in days to weeks, not months to years
![⟨19⟩Get in touch](https://agilemd.com/</about/contact>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/62d742c41f3f8d703913c1d6_icons8-towels.svg)
##### **Reporting & Benchmarking**
Understand and drive practice patterns
![⟨19⟩Style Guide](https://agilemd.com/</template/style-guide>)
###### Predict & Prioritize
### eCART™
##### FDA Cleared Clinical Deterioration Early Warning & Workflow
For every hour of delayed ICU transfer, the odds of hospital mortality increase 3%. When high-risk patients are transferred in a timely manner, their associated length of stay decreases by 2 days.
Our partner health systems use eCART™ to improve these preventable outcomes, empowering their nurses and providers with better information on patient status, more support with an acuity-based workflow, and far fewer false alarms. Developed out of more than a decade of research and clinical implementation, our best-in-class analytic was trained and tested on nearly 3 million patient encounters from 28 hospitals across 6 health systems. It was retrospectively and prospectively validated on sepsis, COPD, CHF, and COVID populations.
Request Demo⟨14⟩Publications ⟨10⟩|⟨20⟩ News⟨12⟩

##### eCART Benefits
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/6615c0edcbd39e7401501a3d_img_med_stamp_5.png)

**Decreased mortality, length of stay and direct variable costs**
###### Nurse Manager
"I love the simplicity of the scoring. Love that the color is in their face when the patient rises to that level, but otherwise out of the way. So much less alarm fatigue."
###### Novice Nurse
"I know exactly when and how to escalate my concerns and worry because it's right at my fingertips inside eCART." 
###### Standardize & Improve
### Clinical Pathways
##### Highly-Integrated & Adaptable Guidance
When clinical staff struggle to adopt the most updated medical evidence and facility protocols, patient care suffers and clinical resources get strained.
Our community of leading health systems use pathways to reduce clinical variation. Pathways integrate seamlessly with native EHR workflows and are deployed quickly without having to rely heavily on IT support. Teams easily convert existing guidance or leverage AgileMD’s substantial library of shared content to develop workflows customized for local needs and goals. More than 3,350 AgileMD pathways are live at partner institutions and cover adult, pediatric, and neonate topics in ambulatory, emergency, inpatient, ICU, and women's health settings. Our partners have published over 20 journal articles on their operational and outcome achievements with AgileMD Pathways.
Request Demo⟨14⟩Publications ⟨11⟩|⟨20⟩ News⟨12⟩

##### Clinical Pathways Benefits
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/6615c0ecb737e693c615f258_img_med_stamp_4.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/66159bdecee93d965f9044bd_hourglass-half.png)
**Reduced throughput, length of stay and readmissions**
###### Chief Quality Officer, 1800+ Bed Health System
“We had developed a ton of clinical variation reduction pathways over the course of time but it was very difficult to get those into workflows. We felt they were collecting dust and not being utilized to the maximum capacity. [Pathways] really allowed us to get our evidence-based practice into practice faster and more reliably.”
###### Chief Quality Officer, 2,300+ Bed Health System
"We have driven adherence rates to guideline best practices through the roof with this pathway.”
### Secure, pragmatic, built to the toughest CIO standards
The AgileMD Cloud CDS engine is SOC-II and HIPAA compliant with industry security architecture. ‍
Our hosted platform requires no on-site hardware and operates behind multiple layers of protection, encryption and network security, with advanced audit logging and monitoring services. Our technical team has worked with many premier IT quality control processes and is ready to collaborate with your IT team to configure the right security framework.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62d742c41f3f8d04dc13c14c/660ee3a478ef7e2411289b13_SOC2_Logo_Revised_1_.591b2acad61e2.png)

generated_description:
**AgileMD: Revolutionizing Hospital Care with Predictive Analytics**

AgileMD, founded in 2011 and a proud member of Y Combinator Batch S11, is spearheading a transformation in healthcare. Based in the bustling heart of San Francisco, AgileMD has built a sophisticated cloud-based platform that leverages predictive analytics and clinical algorithms to support healthcare professionals across the United States. Their mission is clear: to enhance hospital care by ensuring patients receive optimal and timely treatment, grounded in the latest medical knowledge.

What does AgileMD actually do? Think of it as a safety net for clinical teams. Their flagship product, **eCART™**, serves as a clinical deterioration early warning system. It harnesses FDA-cleared AI to flag high-risk patients, thereby helping healthcare workers prioritize and escalate care when it matters most. This isn’t just theoretical; the system has been developed through a decade of research, analyzing over 3 million patient encounters across numerous health systems. The result? Reduced mortality rates and shorter hospital stays.

But it's not just about prevention. AgileMD also provides **Clinical Pathways**, which seamlessly integrate with existing Electronic Health Records (EHR). This feature enables clinicians to access updated protocols directly within their workflows, thus minimizing clinical variation and ensuring consistent, high-quality care. With more than 4,000 clinical pathways live across 250 hospitals, AgileMD is making evidence-based practices not just a goal but a reality.

With a dedicated team of 15 employees, AgileMD operates with a nimbleness that allows for rapid deployment of solutions, often within days to weeks rather than months. Their commitment to combining clinical decision support with EHR systems means that healthcare professionals can spend less time wrestling with technology and more time caring for patients. They've earned their credibility too, with over 80 peer-reviewed publications backing their clinical data and methodologies.

As you think about healthcare innovation, AgileMD exemplifies how technology can make an impactful change in patient care. If you’re hungry for better outcomes and less clinical burden, their approach might just be the solution you've been looking for. 

For more insights, you can explore their offerings at [AgileMD.com](https://agilemd.com).
